group.name: Select which action modules to install:

plugin.name: Basic Actions
plugin.description:
Core follower and item actions: • Start/Stop Following • Wait Here • Relax / Stop Relaxing • Pick Up Item • Use Item • Give Item • Bring Item • Loot Container
Recommended for most users.

plugin.name: Travel Actions
plugin.description:
NPC travel and navigation: • Travel to Place (named locations) • Travel to Location (coordinates) • Change Travel Speed • Cancel Travel
Allows NPCs to travel to cities, inns, and other locations.

plugin.name: Combat Actions
plugin.description:
Combat-related behaviors: • Attack Target • Cease Fighting • Yield
Allows NPCs to engage or disengage from combat.

plugin.name: Outfit Actions
plugin.description:
Clothing and armor management: • Equip Clothing Piece • Remove Clothing Piece • Get Dressed • Undress
Allows NPCs to change their equipment.

plugin.name: Furniture Actions
plugin.description:
Furniture interaction: • Sit or Lay Down • Stop Using Furniture
Allows NPCs to use chairs, beds, and other furniture.

plugin.name: Economy Actions
plugin.description:
Economic interactions: • Give Gold • Collect Payment • Extort Gold
Allows NPCs to handle money transactions.

plugin.name: Crafting Actions
plugin.description:
Crafting system: • Craft Item (smithing/smelting) • Brew Potion (alchemy) • Cook Meal (cooking)
Allows NPCs to craft items at workbenches, alchemy labs, and cooking pots.

plugin.name: Arrest Actions
plugin.description:
Guard arrest and crime system: • Arrest Player - Guards confront player about bounty • Arrest NPC - Guards arrest and escort NPCs to jail • Add Bounty to Player - Track crimes in holds • Accept/Reject Persuasion - Handle persuasion attempts • Free From Jail - Release imprisoned NPCs
Allows guards to arrest players and NPCs, track bounties, and manage prisoners.

group.name: Select which context prompts to install:

plugin.name: Core Awareness Prompts
plugin.description:
Basic NPC awareness: • Known Spells - NPCs know what spells they have • Gold Awareness - NPCs know their gold amount • Inventory Awareness - NPCs know their items • Nearby Objects - NPCs aware of surroundings
Recommended for immersion.

plugin.name: Combat Awareness Prompt
plugin.description:
Combat context: • Combat Awareness - NPCs understand combat situations
Helps NPCs respond appropriately during fights.

plugin.name: Travel Guidance Prompt
plugin.description:
Travel behavior rules: • Strict travel constraints - Prevents NPCs from traveling on their own initiative • NPCs will only travel when directly told to by the player
Highly recommended if using Travel Actions.

plugin.name: Survival Prompt
plugin.description: Survival needs awareness: • Hunger Status - NPCs aware of hunger levels • Cold Status - NPCs aware of cold/warmth • Tiredness Status - NPCs aware of fatigue levels

plugin.name: Faction/Guild Reputation Prompt
plugin.description:
Faction awareness: • Guild Reputation - NPCs know your faction standings
Large prompt with detailed guild information.

plugin.name: Arrest/Crime Prompts
plugin.description:
Crime and imprisonment awareness: • Guard Bounty Awareness - Guards know player's bounty • Jailed NPC Status - Imprisoned NPCs aware of situation
Works with Arrest Actions for full crime system.

group.name: Merchant Inventory Prompt - Select ONE (or none):

plugin.name: Merchant Prompt - Show Anywhere
plugin.description:
Merchants display their inventory and pricing at all times, regardless of location.
Use this if you want merchants to always be ready to trade no matter where you encounter them.

plugin.name: Merchant Prompt - Location Restricted
plugin.description:
Merchants only display their inventory when inside recognized shop locations (inns, stores, market stalls, etc.).
More immersive - merchants won't try to sell you things while walking down the road.

plugin.name: OSL Aroused - Modify Arousal Action
plugin.description:
Arousal action for OSL Aroused: • Modify Arousal - Adjust NPC arousal levels
Requires OSL Aroused mod.

plugin.name: SL Aroused - Modify Arousal Action
plugin.description:
Arousal action for SexLab Aroused: • Modify Arousal (SLO) - Adjust NPC arousal levels
Requires SexLab Aroused mod.

plugin.name: OSL Aroused - Arousal Awareness Prompt
plugin.description:
Arousal awareness for OSL Aroused: • NPCs aware of their arousal state
Requires OSL Aroused mod.

plugin.name: SL Aroused - Arousal Awareness Prompt
plugin.description:
Arousal awareness for SexLab Aroused: • NPCs aware of their arousal state
Requires SexLab Aroused mod.

plugin.name: Fertility Status Prompt
plugin.description:
Fertility awareness: • NPCs aware of pregnancy/fertility status
Requires Fertility Mode mod.
